title: 今日美國眾議院議長佩洛西 (Nancy Pelosi) 有野要同香港既示威者講

replies.msg:
Link: https://twitter.com/speakerpelosi/status/1187482869171666951

幫你地手做左抄寫同翻譯。

“Hello friends. For over four months, you, the brave protesters of Hong Kong, have shown the world the dreams of freedom, justice and democracy, can never be extinguished by injustice and intimidation. Your extraordinary courage stands in stark contrast to the cowardly government that refuses to respect rule of law, where the “One Country, Two Systems” framework guarantees more than two decades ago.

As you continue your fight, I urge you to stay safe, and remain non-violent. Remembering the success of Mahatma Gandhi and Dr. Martin Luther King Junior. In the 1950s, Dr. King, Coretta Scott King travelled to India to study Gandhi’s principle of non-violence, so that they could apply them to the civil rights struggle in America. In Sanskrit, the word for non-violent, “satyāgraha” has two meanings. Non-violence, and also insistence on the truth. Dr. King was successful on his insistence on the truth because he did so non-violently.

I urge you to remember that your power is non-violence, as you insist on the truth, that the people of Hong Kong deserve the future of justice and real autonomy that you were promised. The prayers of the American people and all freedom-loving people in the world are with you during this difficult time. Thank you.”

「朋友你們好，這四個月來，你們一班香港勇敢的示威者，向世界展示了自由、正義和民主的夢想是不會被不正義和威嚇所磨滅。你們非凡的勇氣，與拒絕尊重二十多年前「一國兩制」框架所承諾法治的膽怯的政府形成了鮮明的對比。

當你們繼續戰鬥時，我敦促你們保持安全和非暴力。請僅記聖雄甘地與小馬丁·路德·金的成功。在1950年代，金博士和科麗塔·史考特·金恩遠赴了印度學習甘地的非暴力準則，以運用於美國的民權抗爭中。在梵語，非暴力（satyāgraha）有兩層意思：非暴力和對真理的堅持。金博士對真理堅持的成功正正是建基於非暴力的準則之上。

我再次敦促你們的力量正正是非暴力，正如你們對香港未來所應得的正義，和真正自治的承諾之中對真理的堅持一樣。美國人和世界所有熱愛自由的人的禱告會一直和這個困難時期與你們同在。謝謝。」

我再次敦促你們的力量正正是非暴力，正如你們對香港未來所應得的正義，和真正自治的承諾之中對真理的堅持一樣。美國人和世界所有熱愛自由的人的禱告會一直和這個困難時期與你們同在。謝謝。」
